User: Insurance holder
Common risk factors that occur while operating your business are covered by liability insurances. These include but are not limited to: 
 - private liability 
 - agricultural construction 
 - trading of agricultural produce 
 - loss of proceeds 
 For a fully detailed list of risk protections available to you, please visit our website or contact your responsible official.
Storm damage can decimate a farmer's crop with little to no warning.
This insurance will cover the most common types of storm damage, including hail storms, flooding, landslides or heavy rain.
Resulting damages are advised to be documented quickly.
/*account related strings*/ Address: Total Field Area: %1$s ha Change my password User-ID: Role: Personal data OK Number of Fields: %1$d
 Name: Hint If your actual information differ from what is displayed here, please contact your responsible insurance official. Field data:
 No picture taken. No permission to use camera Error while creating photo file Account and Personal Data:

General information about your personal data and your fields are displayed under Account. There is also an option available to change your password. About the App and Language:

'About SoPraApp' displays information about the current name and version of this app alongside an option to switch languages; you can choose between English and German. Map and Fields:

Under 'Start' you can view the map with registered fields colored in blue and reported damage cases on fields in red. Deleting a Damage Case:

To delete a damage case, go to 'Damage Reports' and click and hold the desired damage case. The case and included information will be deleted upon confirming the deletion twice. Logout from your Account:

If you want to logout of your user account, go to 'Logout' in the side bar menu to safely leave the app and return to the starting screen. Using the Menu:

The menu for this app can be opened by clicking the symbol in the upper left-hand corner of your screen or by simply dragging a finger from the left screen edge inwards. By clicking a listing point in the menu, you can access all different parts of functions this app has to offer. Deleting a Field:

To delete a field with its associated information, click and hold that field in the displayed list. You will be asked to confirm the deletion twice to avoid accidental loss of data. Detailed Field Information:

To view a fields detailed information, simply click on the desired field in 'Fields' and the information will fold out. Viewing and Editing a Damage Case:

To edit and review an existing damage report, click on the desired case. A map will open to display the damage case area and above will be a list holding all relevant information, including a symbol to look at the photo taken for this damage case.
Editing the case starts with tapping the pencil symbol which will open a dialogue window to fill up with the necessary information. Changes are saved by clicking 'OK' in the dialogue window. Confirm new password Current password Incorrect password New password You have selected German. App was closed. Please restart the app. You have selected English. App was closed. Please restart the app. Your password has been successfully changed. Password must be at least 4 characters. Passwords do not match. Permissions Camera and Location Select language... Language German English Editing a Field:

Under 'Fields' you can edit a field by clicking on the pencil symbol next to it. A map will open where the corners of the field are marked with position markers. To move a marker, click and hold it; to remove a marker, tap it once. The 'Info' button opens a dialogue window where all necessary information are to be filled in. Reporting a Damage Case:

Under 'Damage Reports' a user can report damages done to their fields by clicking on 'Report Damage Case'. A map will open where a user is required to draw the damage case area on an already existing field. To set the damage area, use 'Set Marker' to mark the corners whereas the markers are set at the position of the hairline cross.
The damage will be attributed to the field it lies in, so it is absolutely required that all corners/markers are within a field. After completing drawing the damage area, clicking on Info will lead to a dialogue window where the necessary information must be filled out. To return to the map and confirm the information, click OK; to finalize the process of reporting the damage case, click 'Save' to be safely returned to Damage Reports. Looking up Contracts:

Under 'Contracts', the user can review all available insurance contracts and view detailed information about them. Included are also the fields that are currently insured by that contract. Registering a Field:

Registering a new field is done with the button 'New Field'. A map view will open. To locate your current position, click on 'GPS'. Markers for the field corners are set in the middle of the screen (the hairline cross) by tapping 'Set Marker'. Clicking and holding the marker will lift it up and allows it to be relocated.
To remove the marker, click it once. After completing drawing the field, all users are required to fill in additional information by clicking on 'Info' and filling in the form. Click 'OK' to go back and 'Save' to save your progress and return to 'Fields'. %1$s can be found under 'Contracts'. %1$s can be found under 'Fields'. %1$s can be found under 'Damage Reports'. No further information available right now. Forces of nature are unpredictable and often bring about devastating damage to your fields and crop. Costs for loss of crop and any other form of damage dealt are tremendous. This contract offers cost coverage for a wide array of natural damages and a relief program to help coordinate harvest and payments within budget to support insurance holders. Despite good preparation for cold winter days, frost damage still comes unexpected and when the crop needs it the least; the damaged crop is unusable and results in a huge loss. This insurances helps covering the costs for the resulting broken water pipes and damaged crop. Game damage is often difficult to pursue and farmers can only sit on the costs. This insurance covers these kind of damage cases, whether it be on buildings or directly on owned fields and crops, and is accompanied by an appropriate contact to your insurance to help coordinate and document the damage. Termites, wasps or even ants are a potential but very real threat for any crop or harvest and result in reduced revenue and overall yield. In spite of taking precaution against pest infestations, it can happen and this insurance covers those types of damage. It includes consulting on site and offers guideline for assessing and reducing the damage done. create delete Create User Insurance Holder: Continue Delete User Create a User Account Create User First Name Password Confirm Password Last Name Address User already exists Passwords do not match. Please fill in all fields. User was successfully created. List of Insurance Holders Number of Damage Cases: %1$d This contract can be found under 'Contracts'. "Discovering criminal damage is infuriating and almost always leaves the owner of destroyed or damaged property with the inability to prosecute the offenders. This insurance offers protection against vandalism by a third party and resulting damages and also helps with expenses for taking corresponding legal actions." Creating a User:

Only as a reviewer, you have the ability to create a new account for an insurance holder. Under 'Account', click on 'Create User' and fill in the form with the necessary information. After filling in the form, clicking on the button 'Create User' will successfully create a new user. Do you want to remove %1$s from the database? "Do you really want to delete %1$s? This action is irreversible and deletes all associated fields and damage reports. " "Deleting a User:

As a reviewer, you have the ability to delete an existing insurance holder account from the app. To delete a user, either click on 'Delete User' or go straight to "List of Insurance Holders". There you are presented with a list of all existing insurance holders. Click and hold one of the displayed names to open a dialog window. You are required to confirm the deletion twice for security reasons before it will actually happen. After confirming the deletion, which will subsequently remove the user's fields and damage reports, please leave the list view to properly update the display data. Afterwards all traces of the user should be gone. "
